title: Zahtar spiced nuts
description: This Lebanese-inspired recipe for herby, spiced nuts makes for an excellent nibble to have with drinks. Use whatever blend of nuts you like.
ingredients: 250g mixed nuts (we used almonds, cashews, hazelnuts and pecans)

method.Step 2: For the zahtar, mix together the dried thyme, sesame seeds and finely grated lemon zest and sea salt.

method.Step 3: Spread the mixed nuts in an even layer on a large baking sheet.

method.Step 4: Sprinkle over the zahtar, then drizzle with tablespoon olive or sesame oil. Toss together, then roast for 10 minutes, or until golden.

method.Step 5: Put the nuts into a bowl and serve warm as a nibble.
